Structs/AndConstraint.html.name: AndConstraint
Structs/AndConstraint.html.abstract: A constraint to check if all of the child constraints are valid or not.

Structs/BlankConstraint.html.name: BlankConstraint
Structs/BlankConstraint.html.abstract: A constraint to validate if a value is blank.

Structs/BoolConstraint.html.name: BoolConstraint
Structs/BoolConstraint.html.abstract: A constraint to validate if a value is a valid boolean value.

Structs/ChoiceConstraint.html.name: ChoiceConstraint
Structs/ChoiceConstraint.html.abstract: A constraint to validate if a value exists in predefined choices.

Structs/DateConstraint.html.name: DateConstraint

Structs/JSONConstraint.html.abstract: A constraint to validate if a value is a JSON string.

Structs/LengthConstraint.html.name: LengthConstraint
Structs/LengthConstraint.html.abstract: A constraint to validate if a value is with a valid length.

Structs/NotBlankConstraint.html.abstract: A constraint to validate if a value is not blank.

Structs/RegexConstraint.html.abstract: A constraint to validate if a value matches a regular expression pattern.

Structs/UUIDConstraint.html.name: UUIDConstraint

Structs/VINConstraint.html.name: VINConstraint

Structs/ConstraintViolation.html.abstract: An error thrown by ConstraintValidator for an invalid value.
